Test running Job with handleHttp.

<<< handleHttp_response.json
{
  "code": 200,
  "message": "OK",
  "data": {
    "Logs": null,
    "Path": "/test-job-handle-http",
    "AuthKind": "hmac-sha256",
    "HeaderSign": "X-Karajo-Sign",
    "Commands": null,
    "LastRun": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "NextRun": "0001-01-01T00:00:00Z",
    "ID": "test_job_handle_http",
    "Name": "Test job handle HTTP",
    "Description": "",
    "Status": "started",
    "Schedule": "",
    "Interval": 0,
    "MaxRunning": 1,
    "NumRunning": 1,
    "LogRetention": 5
  }
}

<<< job_after.json
{
  "Logs": [
    {
      "JobID": "test_job_handle_http",
      "Name": "test_job_handle_http.1.success",
      "Status": "success",
      "Counter": 1,

  ],
